item.title: Purbachal plot graft: Ousted PM Hasina gets total of 21 years in jail in 3 cases
item.description: A Dhaka court has sentenced Sheikh Hasina, the Bangladeshi prime minister ousted by the July Uprising, to a total of 21 years in jail in three cases over corruption in the allocation of land in the Purbachal New Town Project.
